title: Bacon Ranch Potatoes in Pressure Cooker
directions: Cut the potatoes into about 1-inch pieces.
Cut the bacon into small pieces.
Add potatoes, bacon and 2 tablespoons of water into the Instant Pot.
Stir in dried parsley, garlic powder and salt.

Set the instant pot to manual and set the time for 7 minutes. Release the pressure and carefully open the lid. (Note: From a few of readers’ feedback, I learned that size of the pot affects the cooking time. This recipe was made with 6Qt Instant Pot. If yours is bigger, then please add 1-2 tablespoons of additional water and increase the cooking time by about 5-7 minutes.)
Add ranch dressing and cheese and stir to combine. Serve immediately.
